text: G Diaries is a Philippine travel and lifestyle television program hosted by the Bantay Bata Executive Director Ernie Lopez. It features destinations throughout the Philippines for an effort to support ecotourism. The program debuted on June 10, 2017 on ABS-CBN as part of special programming, and has already spanned four seasons. ==Host== * Ernie Lopez (2019–present) * Gina Lopez† (2017–2019) ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Award ! Category ! Recipient !
